meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Chambers and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the President.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the April 16, 2024 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Resolutions for The Mondello
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of financing resolutions for The Mondello multifamily residential development.

agenda_items.title: Resolutions for Axis Kessler Park
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of resolutions for Axis Kessler Park multifamily residential development.

agenda_items.title: Appointment of Assistant Investment Officer
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the appointment of an Assistant Investment Officer and establishment of a TexPool account.

agenda_items.title: Review of Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the DHFC Treasurer’s report for the three-month period ending on March 31, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Review of Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of May 10, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Discussion about Charitable Contributions
agenda_items.description: Discussion about the Corporation making charitable contributions.

agenda_items.title: Discussion of Conference Take-aways
agenda_items.description: Discussion of take-aways from the National Association of Local Housing Finance Agencies conference attended by Corporation staff and Board Members.

financial_items.description: Financing for The Mondello multifamily residential development
Aggregate amount for financing including various loans for The Mondello development
